title: Micro-Sculpting Cream Skin Care Product Test | Olay Regenerist
description: Olay's Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream Moisturizer hydrates to lift, firm and plump your skin so that you can delay the need for a cosmetic procedure. It is formulated with Hyaluronic Acid, Amino-Peptides and Vitamin B3. Be your best beautiful by using Olay's skin care products. This video is about Olay's Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream Moisturizer skin care product.

asset.author: olay
asset.hookText: Olay's Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream Moisturizer hydrates to lift, firm and plump your skin so that you can delay the need for a cosmetic procedure.

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Let's see how a Regenerist Microsculpting Cream is so effective in keeping your skin firm and elastic. These are hydration beads, and we left them to soak or hydrate for 24 hours. We left one as it was, but coated the other with Regenerist and left them for some more time to see how hydrated they remained. 

See that? The untreated bead has shrunk and lost its bounce because it has dehydrated. Hydration of the skin influences its elasticity, so the more hydrated you can keep your skin, the firmer and more elastic it will become.
